item.title: Fuzzing Evolution: How developers make Bitcoin more secure
item.description: [WIP] I find the evolution of Bitcoin’s fuzzing infrastructure interesting, so I am writing a essay to make a survey of that. Fuzzing Evolution: How developers make Bitcoin more secure Intro Bitcoin is one of the most prominent distributed software systems in the world, and a key part of a potentially revolutionary new form of decentralized financial (DeFi) tool, cryptocurrency. Due to its distributed nature, Bitcoin in some sense is the sum of the operations of the code executed by many independent nodes rather than the original software created by Satoshi Nakamoto.
